    • Uses of Position in roboRallyPackage

      Methods in roboRallyPackage that return Position 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Position[] Position.getAllNeighbours()
      Returns a list of positions that are neighbours of this position (this position is not includes in the list).
      Position Position.getNeighbour(Orientation orientation)
      Returns the position that lies next to this position, given a certain orientation.
      Position Position.getNeighbourAt(Orientation orientation, int steps)
      Returns the position that lies a given steps from this position, given a certain orientation.
      Position OrientatedPosition.getPosition() 
      Methods in roboRallyPackage that return types with arguments of type Position 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<Position,java.util.Set<Element>> Board.getElements()
      Returns the variable representing the set of elements placed on this Board.
      Methods in roboRallyPackage with parameters of type Position 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Board.canElementBePutAtPosition(Position position, Element element)
      Returns whether the given element can be placed on this board at the given position.
      boolean Board.canElementBePutAtPosition(Position position, Element element, java.util.Map<Position,java.util.Set<Element>> elements)
      Returns whether the given element can be placed on this board at the given position with the given set of elements.
      java.util.Set<Element> Board.getElements(Position position)
      Returns the elements on a certain position.
      Element Board.getFirstElementStartingAt(Position position, Orientation orientation)
      Returns an element placed on this board on the first position one encounters while moving forward in a straight line starting from the given position with the given orientation.
      long Position.getManhattanDistance(Position other)
      Returns the ManhattanDistance between this position and another position.
      boolean Position.isPlacedAtOrientationOf(Position other, Orientation orientation)
      Returns true if the other position lies on the same line as this position, given a certain orientation (referring to this position).
      static boolean Position.isValidPosition(Position position)
      Checks whether the given position is a valid position.
      boolean Board.isValidPositionOnBoard(Position position)
      Returns whether the given position is a valid position for this board.
      void Board.moveElement(Position position, Element element)
      Moves a given element from one place on this board to another place on this board if possible.
      void Board.putElement(Position position, Element newElement)
      Places a given element on this board on a given position if this element can be placed there.
      Method parameters in roboRallyPackage with type arguments of type Position 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
